name: Freys Hotel

reviews.text: I stayed for 5 nights in a standard 1 persons room. As I relied partially on this site to book the hotel, I will come back on some points raised by other users.
reviews.title: quiet, clean and excellent service

reviews.text: 1) In contrast what previous people claimed, I found the room large enough. My room was certainly not smaller than any other room in a European city.
reviews.title: Great location, well designed place to stay.

reviews.text: 2) Concerning the shower - bath room problem: it seems that they have solved the problems using a very nice system with movable showing doors. (difficult to explain how it works, but very efficient and elegant solution).
reviews.title: Cozy hotel in a good location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 3) breakfast: I found it great! Enough warm dishes, and sufficient of bread / toast / juices. Liked it very much.
reviews.title: five star service

reviews.text: 4) Service: my luggage was lost at the airport for more than 3 days, and the staff helped me a lot getting it back by making phone calls to the airport. Cleaning of my clothes was offered for free!
reviews.title: Very nice place

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Proximity to train station makes for easy arrival, but the side street is a little creepy. Easy access to old town, shopping. Helpful staff. Lobby is dark and cramped; room is nicely sized. Whole place could use some updating and cleaning, but for the price and location, it's a good deal. We would stay here again as it's pluses greatly outweigh its detriments, but don't expect a five star hotel.
reviews.title: Frey's in Stockholm

reviews.text: Everything was great: good location (very close to the Arlanda express, close to the old city), good breakfast buffet, helpfull staf, free internet access (free of charge since may 1st). We stayed in a suite which had more than enough room for the extra bed. We will definitely choose this hotel again on our next trip to Stockholm.
reviews.title: Great hotel, close to central station

reviews.text: We stayed at the Freys Hotel this past April. We had a triple room, with a balcony. The room itself was keep very clean, and all of the hotel staff were very nice. We took the Arlanda Express train in from the airport and it is 1 block away from the hotel, which made it very easy on us. Our room was large, as was the baclony.They brought in a roll away bed for our teenage daughter. The breakfast in the morning had many items to choose from, and you can walk to almost anyway in the city. We were about 2 blocks from the main shopping street which had dozens of restaurants and coffe shops on it. It was about a 15-20 min. walk to Old Town. We only used the subway once. Old Town was very interesting, like stepping back in time. We would also recommend a boat sightseeing tour. The Vasa museum was fantastic, with this complete 300+ year old ship that was put back together. All and all, Stockholm is a wonderful city with losts of museums. All the people we met spoke perfect English and were very helpful and polite.
reviews.title: Great Hotel in Perfect Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The hotel staff were very helpful since we were stuck there and extra 5 nights do to the Volcanic ash from Iceland. We were luck to be able to keep our room, since the hotel was fully booked, but those that were heading for it couldn"t get in. There were many people walking the streets with their suitcases!
reviews.title: great location
Charming!..
reviews.text: The front desk even made phone calls for us to try and strighten things out about our flight home, which changed from day to day.

I shared room with my teenager, and in the adjoining room were my 70+ parents. We all liked the hotel. The cosy, homely feel in the corridor leading to the rooms probably contribute to people´s quiet behaviour in this hotel -
reviews.title: First class location and our room was quiet!

reviews.text: Our rooms were extremely quiet - - facing a nice backyard. Acoustics in breakfast restaurant very good - no noise disturbance there, either, although a fair amount of people chatting around us.
reviews.title: highly recommendable

reviews.text: I would highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Only good

reviews.text: PS But don´t expect to get the sauna for free - it costs some 60 kronors. So I would not say it is a full 4 class hotel, rather, as was said in an earlier review, a 3 +.
reviews.title: Fantastic Freys, completely surpassed our expectations and needs!

reviews.text: The hotel however near the city has quiet rooms, Easy access to transportation and shopping areas. Staff very friendly and courteous. Full breakfast.
reviews.title: Central and good hotel

reviews.text: This was a lovely hotel. Nice and clean and not far from the city centre. It was walking distance to lots of amenities and was easily accessible to local busses.
reviews.title: Really good quality for the money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were friendly and the hotel was quite modern and cozy.
reviews.title: Just a cosy small pearl
Good location, terrific service
reviews.text: This hotel is a kind of hidden gem in the middle of city centre. On the next door stand the best shopping areas on Stockholm.
Staff was very friendly and warmhearted. I don't have anything negative to say about this hotel.
reviews.title: Good standard hotel - excellent location for arrival by train
Booking confusion!
reviews.text: nice hotel, Belgian themed restaurant/bar, good service. Overall good value for your Kroner

description: Modern hotel offering warm hospitality, restaurant and bar; located in city center near shopping and major attractions.
